meanings.meaning: be accessible anywhere and at anytime

vlive.korean: [어디든??] 댓글로 남겨주시면... If you leave a comment... 듣기 View video ASTRO : [ASTRO PLAY] in 2019 Awards🎉
우리 에비뉴와 AB6IX가 가는 곳이라면 어디든 함께 하겠습니다! I will go wherever AB6IX and ABNEW go! 듣기 View video AB6IX : [Replay] AB6IX 1ST ALBUM [6IXENSE] SHOWCASE
vlive.english: I will go wherever AB6IX and ABNEW go!

vlive.korean: '웅크렸던 자세를 펴 어디든 걸어 여유'... it goes, "Stretch my body after crouching. Walk at anywhere...". 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 집가기시룬🐖🐇
vlive.english: it goes, "Stretch my body after crouching. Walk at anywhere...".

vlive.korean: [할말다한] - 어디든 맡기려면... - 저거 돈만 있으면... [We have to say...] - If you find a company... - If you have money... 듣기 View video SF9 : [FOR FANTASY] 셒구상사 (SF9 SANGSA) EP.01
vlive.english: [We have to say...] - If you find a company... - If you have money...

vlive.korean: [CHAP 6] [따나 선장과 함께라면 어디든 갈 수 있지!] 오늘 1시에 출발합니다 뿌뿌! [CHAP 6] [We can go anywhere as long as we're with Captain San-ha!] We leave at 1 today! Bboo-bboo! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [V PICK! 1분 입덕가이드] 아스트로 윤산하 편 (1min-Helpful Guide to ASTRO YOON SANHA)
vlive.english: [CHAP 6] [We can go anywhere as long as we're with Captain San-ha!] We leave at 1 today! Bboo-bboo!

examples.korean: Sit wherever you like. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 어디든 (네가) 앉고 싶은 곳에 앉아. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Sit wherever you like. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: His dog goes everywhere with him. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 개는 그와 함께 어디든 다닌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His dog goes everywhere with him. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You are in no condition to go anywhere. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신은 어디든 갈 수 있는 (건강) 상태가 아닙니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You are in no condition to go anywhere. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I’m free now to live wherever I please. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 난 이제 어디든 내가 살고 싶은 곳에서 자유롭게 살 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’m free now to live wherever I please. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It’s the same in any situation: in a prison, hospital or whatever. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것은 어떤 상황에서든 동일하다. 교도소든, 병원이든, 그 어디든. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s the same in any situation: in a prison, hospital or whatever. Add to Wordbook
